attributes.action:
Ban the sale of fireworks to the general public 
Safe 4 emergency works & Pets
attributes.additional_details:
Stop the sale of Fireworks to the general public and let’s have them for public displays only and let stop people getting injured and pets 

Bring in prison sentences for the misuse of fireworks there is completely no need for acceptable behaviour it had no place in the uk 

Let’s get rid of fire works going off for a month and have a day or so of public displays only and make them into events for people to enjoy without injury or stress to pets and people with anxiety, and mental health.
attributes.background:
After watching the news tonight I really do wonder why the government really are not doing more to stop the public like sale of fire work 

For get the tax they make and think about the poor animals mainly Dogs Horses 

Let’s not forget the Emergency services workers like the firefighters 🚒

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action: 

Limit the sale and use of Fireworks to licence holders only 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700013
